name: Touch It
author: Busta Rhymes
album: 《E.L.E. (Extinction Level Event): The Final World Front》

wikipedia.title: Touch It (Busta Rhymes song)
wikipedia.extract: "Touch It" is a song by Busta Rhymes. Released on December 13, 2005, it was the first single from Rhymes' Aftermath/Interscope debut, The Big Bang. The song charted well in New Zealand peaking at number one on the RIANZ Singles Chart. The song features a minimalistic beat provided by Swizz Beatz, and a sample from the song "Technologic" by electronic duo Daft Punk. The song in turn was subsequently borrowed back in their live album, Alive 2007.

opinions.details: 这个真的不清楚言外之意具体是什么
